title: Skeleton
summaries: The Skeleton is an enemy that frequently spawns in the Cavern layer as one of many variants. Regular Skeletons can be spawned by the Skeleton Statue.

Like many other enemies that follow the Fighter AI, Skeletons can open doors and Tall Gates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), albeit only during Blood Moons or rarely in Graveyards(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions). On [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console and 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version], they can open doors at any time.

In Expert Mode(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), certain Skeletons are able to throw bones when they are close to the player. Regular bone-throwing Skeletons can be spawned by the Bone Skeleton Statue in any difficulty.
